meanings.definition: Resembling a hose in shape or function.
meanings.sent1: The long, hoselike tube connected the water source to the sprinkler.
meanings.sent2: The garden hose had a hoselike appearance, making it easy to recognize.
meanings.sent3: The hoselike design of the vacuum cleaner made it look like a giant straw.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, flowing down her back, looked hoselike in its smoothness and sleekness.
meanings.sent5: The hoselike structure of the tunnel allowed for water to flow smoothly through it.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a hose.
meanings.sent1: The hoselike material of the pipe made it flexible and easy to bend.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter's uniform included a hoselike attachment for spraying water.
meanings.sent3: The hoselike behavior of the snake charmer mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was hoselike in its ability to carry across the large room.
meanings.sent5: The hoselike structure of the plant allowed it to absorb water efficiently.

meanings.definition: In the manner of a hose.
meanings.sent1: The water sprayed hoselike from the nozzle, reaching every corner of the garden.
meanings.sent2: She moved hoselike, extending her arm to mimic the motion of a hose.
meanings.sent3: The magician waved his wand hoselike, creating a stream of colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent4: The ribbon curled hoselike around the pole, forming an elegant spiral.
meanings.sent5: The wind blew hoselike through the narrow alley, carrying leaves and debris with it.
